body_html:
I have to stop looking at this, since I have higher priority interrupts.

I'm not sure it's actually a refcounting bug. I audited each free in newCoalesce and they all looked OK. If I looked at this again, I would probably double check that the original struct before and after are equal (the prints claim they are, but maybe something else changed...)

body:
I have to stop looking at this, since I have higher priority interrupts.

I'm not sure it's actually a refcounting bug. I audited each free in newCoalesce and they all looked OK. If I looked at this again, I would probably double check that the original struct before and after are equal (the prints claim they are, but maybe something else changed...)
